desc: CBD Bud Shop stock a wide range of premium quality swiss grown CBD Hemp flowers. Pineapple Express Hemp Flower, Stardawg Hemp Flower. CBD Bud Shop stock the UK's only Purple CBD Flower, that's right, it is CBD Hemp flower with a deep purple colour and beautiful citrus scent. Look no further for UK based CBD Flower.

layout.text:
